articles.title: Intranasal vaccine aims to block virus at point of entry - GMA News Online
articles.description: An experimental intranasal COVID-19 vaccine now being tested for the first time in humans showed promising results in monkeys, researchers will report on Thursday at ASV 2021, the annual meeting of the American Society of Virology.

articles.title: Canada to reopen its borders to fully vaccinated Americans starting Aug. 9 - USA TODAY

articles.title: All children should wear masks in school this fall, even if vaccinated, according to pediatrics group - NBC News
